scripts.watch: npm run link-packages && lerna run --parallel watch
scripts.link-packages: cd packages/layouts && yarn link && cd ../lib && yarn link && yarn link pro-layouts && cd ../gallery && yarn link && yarn link pro-layouts && yarn link pro-gallery-lib && cd ../playground && yarn link pro-gallery && yarn link pro-gallery-lib && cd ../ssr-simulator && yarn link pro-gallery && cd ../..
scripts.build-packages-by-order: cd packages/layouts && npm run build && cd ../lib && npm run build && cd ../gallery && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.build-all-and-start-playground: npm run link-packages && npm run build-packages-by-order && npm run start-playground
scripts.test: npm run link-packages && npm run build-packages-by-order && lerna run --parallel test
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.patch: npm run lint && npm run test:all && node scripts/releaseVersion --patch
scripts.minor: npm run lint && npm run test:all && node scripts/releaseVersion --minor
scripts.major: npm run lint && npm run test:all && node scripts/releaseVersion --major
